Text: Some subs are missing! Like SWE, NOR, DEN, FIN. They are 0 MB in size.

I never delete the subtitles tracks because that doesn't make any difference in the size or the compression, but with this movies something wrong happens during remaking, and some tracks are lost, except English and Spanish.
Sorry very much for the inconveniences!

..this is a great movie and it's a pitty with the subs.. if you need a free compression tool checkout the link http://www.mrbass.org/dvdshrink/ ..it has instructions.. it would be appreciated if the movie could be uploaded again with the promised subs..
